name: Ext_R3_Sequence_readCoverage
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.Sequence.readCoverage for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents Sequence.readCoverage from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Sequence|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Average number of reads representing a given nucleotide in the reconstructed sequence
element.definition: Coverage (read depth or depth) is the average number of reads representing a given nucleotide in the reconstructed sequence.
element.comment: `MolecularSequence.readCoverage` has no related element in R5:MolecularSequence

element.short: Average number of reads representing a given nucleotide in the reconstructed sequence
element.definition: Coverage (read depth or depth) is the average number of reads representing a given nucleotide in the reconstructed sequence.
element.comment: `MolecularSequence.readCoverage` has no related element in R5:MolecularSequence
